forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers and a possible thunderstorm during the morning will give way to mostly cloudy skies this afternoon. High 16C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers with the chance of some thunder during the morning hours, then skies turning partly cloudy during the afternoon. High 61F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. A stray shower or thunderstorm is possible. Low 8C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy this evening, then becoming cloudy after midnight. A stray shower or thunderstorm is possible. Low 47F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. A stray shower or thunderstorm is possible. High 17C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. A stray shower or thunderstorm is possible. High 63F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. A stray shower or thunderstorm is possible. Low 8C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. A stray shower or thunderstorm is possible. Low 46F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.
